feed.title: Ephemeral Anchors: Fixing V3 Package RBF againstpackage limit pinning

entry.title: Ephemeral Anchors: Fixing V3 Package RBF againstpackage limit pinning
entry.summary: In an email exchange between Greg Sanders and Peter Todd on February 2, 2023, Sanders expressed his need to change test vectors. When asked for specifics, Peter inquired if these changes would affect tests that verify non-standard elements. The conversation ended with Peterâ€™s signature, which included a link to his personal website. No other details were provided.
